sentences.sentence: "And we have killed her," Nibs said hoarsely.
sentences.translation: “我们杀了她。”尼布斯声音嘶哑地说。

sentences.sentence: "You are not; you are not," Hook cried hoarsely.
sentences.translation: “你不是；你不是。”胡克嘶哑地叫道。

sentences.sentence: "I never seed no sense in th' Doxology afore," he said hoarsely, "but I may change my mind i' time."
sentences.translation: “我以前对赞美诗从来没什么感觉。”他声音嘶哑地说，“但我现在可能已经改变我的想法了。”
